    IJCOBridgeReflected
    public class Binding
extends BindingBase
    The base .NET class managing System.Windows.Data.Binding, PresentationFramework, Version=9.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35.

    .NET documentation at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/System.Windows.Data.Binding

    Powered by JCOBridge: more info at https://www.jcobridge.com

    Author:
    MASES s.r.l https://masesgroup.com
